overview.address: Gati Shakti Vishwavidyalaya (formerly NRTI), Lalbaug, Manjalpur, Vadodara, Gujarat - 390004

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Candidates must appear for the JEE (Main) exam and either secure at least 75% marks (65% for SC/ST/PwD) in Class XII or be within the category-wise top 20 percentile in their respective Class XII board examination. For more details, refer to the JEE Main Performance Criteria in Class XII.

fee_waiver.point 1: 100% Tuition Fee waiver and 50% Hostel Fee waiver for students with family income less than ₹1 lakh per annum.
fee_waiver.point 2: 50% Tuition Fee waiver and 25% Hostel Fee waiver for students with family income between ₹1 lakh to ₹3 lakh per annum.
